gen:link.msg:message: v7717_a: [Ease of substitution in terms of time for substitution] facts must (if reported) be one of the items [H: >6 months], [MH: >1 month and <= 6 months], [ML: >= 1 week and <=1 month], [L: <1 week], [H: >1 month], [MH: >1 week and <= 1 month], [ML: >1 day and <= 1 week], [L: <=1 day], [H: >1 week], [MH: >2 days and <= 1 week], [ML: >1 and <= 2 days] --> [T 20.01.a, T 20.01.w, T 20.02.a, T 20.02.w, T 20.03.a, T 20.03.w, T 20.04.a, T 20.04.w, T 20.05.a, T 20.05.w] [ei720] in {{[eba_ZZ:x357], [eba_ZZ:x358], [eba_ZZ:x359], [eba_ZZ:x360], [eba_ZZ:x362], [eba_ZZ:x363], [eba_ZZ:x364], [eba_ZZ:x365], [eba_ZZ:x367], [eba_ZZ:x368], [eba_ZZ:x369]}} FAILS because {$a} = (xs:QName('eba_ZZ:x357'), xs:QName('eba_ZZ:x358'), xs:QName('eba_ZZ:x359'), xs:QName('eba_ZZ:x360'), xs:QName('eba_ZZ:x362'), xs:QName('eba_ZZ:x363'), xs:QName('eba_ZZ:x364'), xs:QName('eba_ZZ:x365'), xs:QName('eba_ZZ:x367'), xs:QName('eba_ZZ:x368'), xs:QName('eba_ZZ:x369')) is not true
